entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023
